name: HepatitisB
title: Hepatitis B
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of acute or chronic hepatitis B.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a diagnosis of acute or chronic hepatitis B.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
